overview: On a curving blue-gray sectional couch without arms, in front of a large leafy green plant and a wall of purple drapes, close to a window with light coming through the curtains, Colby James (black t-shirt with white design, long  frosted blond surfer hair) sucks Bryce Van Ryan (white t-shirt with black trim, short spiky brown hair); Bryce sucks and rims Colby; Bryce tops Colby from behind and in missionary position on the couch; Colby gives Bryce a facial.
title: Gulp 4
